name: Firefox Win10 Color Scheme Dark
description:
Complies with windows 10 color theme but makes tabs dark. Combined from two premade themes.

Dark: https://userstyles.org/styles/135593/firefox-edge-light-dark

Windows 10: https://userstyles.org/styles/123821/firefox-windows-10

discussions.name: Can you have a complete dark them for the menu bars and such ???
